title: KHM Travel Group Wins Multiple Awards for Revenue Growth
text:
Brunswick-based host travel agency wins Case Western Reserve's Weatherhead 100 award and is named one of Crain's 52 Fastest-Growing Companies.
September 29th, 2015 (Brunswick, Ohio) â€“ KHM Travel Group is a leader in the travel industry and now has two new awards to represent their excellence in business. The Weatherhead 100 award and Crain's 52 Fastest-Growing Companies selection showcase the host travel agency's tremendous growth and sustained success.
Weatherhead 100
Case Western Reserve's Weatherhead 100 award recognizes the 100 fastest-growing companies in Northeast Ohio. In addition to being honored because of the company's growth over the past five years, KHM Travel Group was also selected for this award based on their sustainability practices. The organization's main focus is training and offering support for their 3,600+ travel agents. These agents use the knowledge and skills provided to grow professional and socially responsible businesses all across the United States.
Crain's 52
The Crain's 52 Fastest-Growing Companies list looks at companies in Northeast Ohio who demonstrate the entrepreneurial spirit, remarkable revenue growth and creative business practices. As a member of this list, KHM Travel Group ranks among the top companies to watch in terms of the new and innovative programs they offer their travel agents. On November 4th, the top ten of these fifty-two companies will be announced at an awards ceremony.
 "Being recognized for our growth and sustainability practices is a significant accomplishment for us, but it really benefits our agents too," says CEO and President Rick Zimmerman. "With rapid growth comes increased buying power, which allows us to expand the benefits we provide our agents and their travel clients."
Since the company launched over ten years ago, KHM Travel Group has received countless travel industry awards including Vacation.com: President's Award; Sandals & Beaches: Top 10 Sandals and Beaches Agency in the World; Karisma Hotels & Resorts: Top Growth for Gourmet Inclusive Vacation Consultant & Top 10 El Dorado Royale Producer; Carnival Cruise Lines' Excellence Award; Apple Vacations' National Crystal Apple Award; and Royal Caribbean's Partner of the Year for the Mid-Atlantic Region.
For more information about KHM Travel Group, visit www.khmtravel.com .
ABOUT KHM TRAVEL GROUP - KHM Travel Group is one of the nation's fastest-growing host travel agencies, currently supporting 3,600+ independent home-based travel agents across the United States. With an innovative training and support program, along with a dedicated staff of over 50 full-time employees, KHM Travel Group specializes in helping individuals sell travel products including cruises, vacation packages, tours, honeymoons, group travel and more. For more information, visit www.khmtravel.com .
